List Available Weeks

Source: R/listing.R
list_weeks.Rd

Returns the week identifiers available for a given course, or across all courses if no course is specified.

Usage

list_weeks(course = NULL)

Arguments

course

Character course identifier (e.g., "mc451"). If NULL, returns the union of weeks across all installed courses.

Value

Character vector of week identifiers (e.g., "week_01", "week_02"), sorted numerically.

Examples

list_weeks()
#>  [1] "week_01" "week_02" "week_03" "week_04" "week_05" "week_06" "week_07"
#>  [8] "week_08" "week_09" "week_10" "week_11" "week_12" "week_13" "week_14"
#> [15] "week_15" "week_16" "week_17"
list_weeks("mc451")
#>  [1] "week_01" "week_02" "week_03" "week_04" "week_05" "week_06" "week_07"
#>  [8] "week_08" "week_09" "week_10" "week_11" "week_12" "week_13" "week_14"
#> [15] "week_15" "week_16" "week_17"
